name: Fight a Supermassive Blackhole
description:
Welcome... To the sequel to the criticlly acclaimed game... FIGHT A SUPERMASSIVE BLACK HOLE!! Jump, shoot, die, die... die. Platform your way through a completely broken world that you caused! 

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move. W, Up arrow, or space make ya jump, and S, Down arrow, or the middle mouse button make you "croutch" (very useful for the part of the boss where your running away from it"
